data.title: Organisation
data.text:
The Board approves the Foundation’s charter, its budget and staff appointment schemes, its rules of procedure and salary regulations as well as the appointment of the Director. The Board may also make decisions on other matters. It monitors the management of the Foundation and approves the annual accounts and the discharge of the management pursuant to section 7 of the Lower Saxony Memorials Foundation Act.

The members of the Foundation’s Board are:

Julia Willie Hamburg, Lower Saxony Minister for Culture and Education, Chairman (Deputy: Permanent Secretary Marco Hartrich)

N.N. (CDU member of the Lower Saxony State Parliament) (Deputy: N.N.)

Christoph Bratmann (SPD member of the Lower Saxony State Parliament) (Deputy: Dr. Silke Lesemann)

N.N. (Bündnis 90/Die Grünen member of the Lower Saxony State Parliament) (Deputy: Eva Viehoff)

Dieter Münzebrock (Wolfenbüttel prison/Lower Saxony Ministry of Justice) (Deputy: Christine Meyer)

Dr. Ulrich Haselhoff (Lower Saxony Ministry of Finance) (Deputy: N.N.)

Dr. Britta Bopf (Secretary at the Federal Commission for Culture and the Media) (Deputy: Hanna Liever)

Michael Fürst (Lower Saxony Federation of Jewish Communities) (Deputy: Marina Jalowaja)

Prof. Menachem Z. Rosensaft, World Federation of Bergen-Belsen Associations (USA), Chairman of the Foundation’s Advisory Board, (Deputy: Michael Gander, Association of Memorials and Remembrance Initiatives in Lower Saxony, Deputy Chairman of the Foundation’s Advisory Board)

The following members of the Advisory Board attend the Board meetings in an advisory capacity:

Janine Marx-Moyse

Dietmar Sedlaczek (Association of Memorials and Remembrance Initiatives in Lower Saxony)

Christel Trouvé (Fondation pour la Mémoire de la Déportation, France)

The Advisory Board advises the Foundation’s Board on all matters of memorial work and historical research pursuant to section 9 of the Lower Saxony Memorial Foundation Act. Its members represent various survivors’ associations as well as other organisations, associations and foundations.
